account-hint: Account cannot be changed after registration

channel-ui-mode-three-line-label: Always use Three-Column Mode (for Show mode and live streams)

confirm-remove-from-queue: Are you sure you want to remove {{0}} from the queue?
confirm-terminate-membership: Are you sure you want to revoke {{0}}'s membership?
confirm-unblock-user: Are you sure you want to unblock {{0}}?
connection-failed-message: Connection failed. Retrying... After clicking 'OK', you will be automatically logged out of your account.
dont-show-next-time: Don't show this message next time
entertainment-mode-description: Original quality, stereo effect (for queued channels, karaoke, etc.)
forbid-guest-queue-label: Forbid guests from taking the mic
forbid-guest-text-label: Forbid guests from sending text messages
forbid-guest-url-label: Forbid guests from sending text messages containing URLs
forbid-guest-voice-label: Forbid guest voice in Free mode
forbid-invite-group-label: Do not invite me to channels
forbid-only-admin-text-label: Only allow administrators to send text messages
forbid-stranger-message-label: Do not accept messages from strangers
friend-application-sent: Application sent. Please wait for the user to respond.
guest-text-gap-time-label: Time interval for guests to send text messages
guest-text-max-length-label: Maximum length of text messages for guests
guest-text-wait-time-label: Wait time before guests can send text messages
hide-online-to-friend: Don't show your online status to friends
increase-queue-time: Increase the queue time for the current user
invite-member-label: You are about to invite the following user
invite-you-to-be-member: Invited you to be a member
member-application-sent: Application sent. Please wait for the user to respond.
member-invitation-sent: Invitation sent. Please wait for the user to respond.
message-only-label: This channel is for messages only
mix-all-source-label: Reverb for all sounds played by the computer (hardware driver support required)
mix-setting-auto-label: Auto-set (automatically sets the best audio effect for different scenarios)
move-all-user-to-channel: Move all users to my channel
name: Name
non-friend-message: This user is not in your friends list. Some features are unavailable!
non-friend-warning-message: You are not yet friends with this user, so this feature is not available!
non-online-message: This user is currently offline and cannot reply immediately
not-available-page: The page is not open yet
notify-friend-online: Remind me when a friend goes online.
password-invalid-format: Password must be 8-20 characters and can only contain @$!%*#?& as special characters
password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters
please-fix-form-errors: Please fix the errors in the form
please-input-all-required: Please fill in all required fields
please-input-channel-password: Please enter the channel password (1-4 digits)

quick-enter-server: Press Enter to quickly join a server
readme:
## Disclaimer

**[RiceCall](https://github.com/NerdyHomeReOpen/RiceCall)** (referred to as RC voice) is an **independent development** project by **[NerdyHomeReOpen](https://github.com/NerdyHomeReOpen)** (referred to as this team). It is **not affiliated with the original development team, server, or any official organization of RaidCall**. Please use it at your own risk.

Currently, all versions of RC voice are test versions. If you find any issues during use, please report them through the following methods:
- In the application: Menu > Feedback
- GitHub: [Issue Report](https://github.com/NerdyHomeReOpen/RiceCall/issues)
- Discord: Join [Official Discord](https://discord.gg/adCWzv6wwS) to get the latest information

Please note that all data (including but not limited to account, level, VIP, voice group, etc.) of RC voice **may be reset, lost, or deleted**, and this team reserves the final decision.

RC voice **is not a continuation, remake, or official authorization version of RaidCall**, and **does not provide restoration, support, or account data recovery for RaidCall services**. This project is purely a self-initiated development action by the enthusiast community, aiming to provide a new voice communication platform, **not for commercial purposes**.

RC voice's content is only for academic research and technical exchange. If you have any copyright, trademark, or other rights issues, please contact us for consultation.

Although RC voice refers to or uses some related materials of RaidCall, the final product is entirely created by this team, **not representing the official stance or intention of RaidCall**. Therefore, we **do not provide any technical support, account recovery, or data query services related to RaidCall**. If you have any related issues, please contact the official RaidCall.

### Open Source Participation

We welcome all developers to participate in the development and maintenance of RC voice. You can contribute through the following methods:
* Fill in the [intention form](https://forms.gle/ZowwAS22dGpKkGcZ8) (please join the [Official Discord](https://discord.gg/adCWzv6wwS) first, and we will contact you if we need to assign you an identity group)
* Fork this project and submit a [Pull Request](https://github.com/NerdyHomeReOpen/RiceCall/pulls) to contribute new features or fixes

Thank you for your support and participation!

This disclaimer can be found in the application: Menu > Help Center > About RiceCall.
reconnection-failed-message: Unable to restore connection. After clicking 'OK', you will be automatically logged out of your account.
remaining-server: You can create {{0}} servers. (Note: Once a server has been created, it cannot be deleted or transferred to another user.)
require-password-placeholder: Enter a 1-4 digit password. If no password is set, only administrators can enter.
search-placeholder: Enter keyword or ID to search
search-server-placeholder: Enter the server ID or name
search-user-placeholder: Enter the user ID or name
semi-public-server-description: (guests are only allowed to join the lobby)
server-name-placeholder: 6-30 characters, no leading or trailing spaces, and cannot contain obscene words.
server-slogan-placeholder: 0-30 characters. The slogan is your team's goal.
setting-speaking-key-description: Click the keyboard or mouse to set the talk key
share-current-server-label: Share my current server with friends
share-recent-server-label: Publicly display my recently visited servers
sound-effect-setting-description: Left-click on the status to enable or disable it.
speaker: Speaker
speaking-mode-auto-key-label: Automatically switch to Push-to-Talk when entering the channel
status-auto-dnd-label: Set status to 'Busy' when running a full-screen game/program.
status-auto-idle-label-2: minutes of inactivity to switch to 'Away' status
text-was-muted-in-channel-message: You have been muted from sending text messages
unforbid-text: Allow this user to send text again
unforbid-voice: Allow this user to speak again
username-invalid-format: Display name can only contain letters, numbers, and Chinese characters
username-min-length: Display name must be at least 1 character
